page.title: 02One Day in 1985 (Cont)
page.content: door.They had come to ask if I would like to come out to play football, I said I would but only for a while as I was going to watch the match in the afternoon. I went with them for a while to play football, we have a grassed area not far from the house where we can play without anyone telling us off and without the danger of smashing a window. After a time I came back in to have lunch and to watch 'On the Ball' Which was about to start,the programme introduced by Jimmy Greaves and Ian StJohn which tells us about the matches being played today around the country and those highlights from matches during the past week. After lunch we made our way to the station to catch the train, on the way we had some sandwiches and coffee in the .
